verses.verse: Let us therefore<WG3767> fear,<WG5399> lest,<WG3379> a promise<WG1860> being left<WG2641> us of entering<WG1525> into<WG1519> his rest,<WG2663> any<WG5100> of you should seem<WG1380> to come<WG5302> short<WG5302> of it.

For to us was the gospel<WG2097> preached,<WG2097> as well<WG2509> as to them: but the word<WG3056> preached<WG189> did not profit<WG5623> them, not being mixed<WG4786> with faith<WG4102> in them that heard<WG191> it.

For we which<WG3588> have believed<WG4100> do enter<WG1525> into<WG1519> rest,<WG2663> as he said,<WG2046> As I have sworn<WG3660> in my wrath,<WG3709> if<WG1487> they shall enter<WG1525> into<WG1519> my rest:<WG2663> although<WG2543> the works<WG2041> were finished<WG1096> from the foundation<WG2602> of the world.<WG2889>

For he spoke<WG2046> in a certain<WG4225> place of the seventh<WG1442> day on this<WG3779> wise,<WG3779> And God<WG2316> did rest<WG2664> the seventh<WG1442> day<WG2250> from all<WG3956> his works.<WG2041>
And in this<WG5129> place again,<WG3825> If<WG1487> they shall enter<WG1525> into<WG1519> my rest.<WG2663>

Seeing<WG1893> therefore<WG3767> it remains<WG620> that some<WG5100> must enter<WG1525> therein,<WG1519> <WG846> and they to whom it was first<WG4386> preached<WG2097> entered<WG1525> not in because<WG1223> of unbelief:<WG543>

Again,<WG3825> he limits<WG3724> a certain<WG5100> day,<WG2250> saying<WG3004> in David,<WG1138> To day,<WG4594> after<WG3326> so<WG5118> long<WG5118> a time;<WG5550> as it is said,<WG2046> To day<WG4594> if<WG1437> you will hear<WG191> his voice,<WG5456> harden<WG4645> not your<WG5216> hearts.<WG2588>
For if<WG1487> Jesus<WG2424> had given them rest,<WG2664> then would he not afterward<WG3326> <WG5023> have spoken<WG2980> of another<WG243> day.<WG2250>
There remains<WG620> therefore<WG686> a rest<WG4520> to the people<WG2992> of God.<WG2316>
For he that is entered<WG1525> into<WG1519> his rest,<WG2663> he also<WG2532> has ceased<WG2664> from his own<WG848> works,<WG2041> as God<WG2316> did from his.

Let us labor<WG4704> therefore<WG3767> to enter<WG1525> into<WG1519> that rest,<WG2663> lest<WG2443> <WG3361> any<WG5100> man fall<WG4098> after<WG1722> the same<WG846> example<WG5262> of unbelief.<WG543>

For the word<WG3056> of God<WG2316> is quick,<WG2198> and powerful,<WG1756> and sharper<WG5114> than<WG5228> any<WG3956> two edged<WG1366> sword,<WG3162> piercing<WG1338> even to the dividing<WG3311> asunder of soul<WG5590> and spirit,<WG4151> and of the joints<WG719> and marrow,<WG3452> and is a discerner<WG2924> of the thoughts<WG1761> and intents<WG1771> of the heart.<WG2588>

Neither<WG2532> <WG3756> is there any creature<WG2937> that is not manifest<WG852> in his sight:<WG1799> but all<WG3956> things are naked<WG1131> and opened<WG5136> to the eyes<WG3788> of him with whom<WG3739> we have to do.<WG3588> <WG3056>

Seeing then<WG3767> that we have<WG2192> a great<WG3173> high<WG749> priest,<WG749> that is passed<WG1330> into the heavens,<WG3772> Jesus<WG2424> the Son<WG5207> of God,<WG2316> let us hold<WG2902> fast our profession.<WG3671>

For we have<WG2192> not an high<WG749> priest<WG749> which cannot<WG3361> <WG1410> be touched<WG4834> with the feeling<WG4834> of our infirmities;<WG769> but was in all<WG3956> points tempted<WG3985> like<WG2596> <WG3665> as we are, yet without<WG5565> sin.<WG266>

Let us therefore<WG3767> come<WG4334> boldly<WG3954> to the throne<WG2362> of grace,<WG5485> that we may obtain<WG2983> mercy,<WG1656> and find<WG2147> grace<WG5485> to help<WG996> in time<WG2121> of need.<WG2121>
